items.longDescription:
Modern Classics, On And Off The Court
A new LifeWear collection developed in collaboration with Roger Federer and designed by JW Anderson, combining Roger’s classic personal style with Anderson’s modern, colorful take on sportswear.

- Body fabric made of fluffy fleece.
- Casual design with accent colors on the front and back.
- Collar and chest pocket made of a different fabric.
- White slide fasteners accent the front center and chest pocket.
- Pull tabs are easy to operate while wearing gloves.
- High collar and windproof piping at the hem and cuffs help keep you warm.
- Lightweight, warm, and soft.
- Regular fit great for layering.
- We support the reduction of waste and of oil consumption. Clothing made using recycled polyester is part of this effort.
Ratios of recycled polyester vary by item. Please check “Materials” for details.
